description:
This unique hand and forearm trainer allows you to isolate and train each individual finger. This is important because each finger is operated by a completely separate system of muscles and tendons in the hand, wrist, and forearm.

  • Blue provides light resistance of 5lbs per finger
  • Red provides medium 7lbs per finger
  • Black provides heavy 9lbs per finger
name: Prohands Gripmaster Forearm and Hand Trainer
